https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/4AQemYYJujGbFKsmUj9tkjNVtIc.jpg The film, in Malayalam and made by the Indian film maker K P Kumaran, AkashaGopuram is set among the Indian immigrant community in London and tells the story of Albert Samson (Mohanlal), a middle-aged architect who has clawed his way to prominence.
